default.name: Unknown
default.description: An unknown item. If this is in your inventory, something probably went wrong.

Keycard_Red.name: Red Keycard
Keycard_Red.description: A keycard that can open doors locked with a red security clearance.

Keycard_Blue.name: Blue Keycard
Keycard_Blue.description: A keycard that can open doors locked with a blue security clearance.

Keycard_Yellow.name: Yellow Keycard
Keycard_Yellow.description: A keycard that can open doors locked with a yellow security clearance.

Keycard_Master.name: Master Keycard
Keycard_Master.description: A master keycard that can open doors locked with any security clearance. Use it wisely!

Die.name: Die
Die.description: A small, rounded cube with dots on each side to represent numbers... I hope you knew that already.

Pen.name: Pen
Pen.description: A writing instrument used to apply ink to a surface. May be useful for poking into small holes?

Paper_Blank.name: Blank Paper
Paper_Blank.description: A blank piece of paper. Very versatile, can be folded into almost any shape.

Paper_Letterhead.name: Letterhead Paper
Paper_Letterhead.description: A piece of paper with a letterhead for Scabor Corporation at the top.

Paper_Profile_Rosemary.name: Subject Profile: Rosemary
Paper_Profile_Rosemary.description: A paper that says "Subject Profile" at the top. It looks like it's about Rosemary.
